name: The Spell
storyline: After the death of her parents, Eloise is forced to live with her uncle. Though she's reluctant to the idea, she soon finds out that it’s not nearly as bad as she had envisioned. That is, until she found a weird note concerning her parents' deaths next to the garbage bin.
summary: The Spell is a Kinetic novel in which you get to follow Eloise as she finds some strange things regarding her parents' death.
